issue.title: Collision Issue With Hand/Nozzle in VRC 3

content.raw: Ok, I've updated to today's gazebo-nightly and drcsim-nightly and will watch for this to come up again.  I just tried and didn't see any issue, but I also didn't have this issue repeatable.  If I see this come up again I'll re-post the issue.  Thanks!
content.html: Ok, I've updated to today's gazebo-nightly and drcsim-nightly and will watch for this to come up again. I just tried and didn't see any issue, but I also didn't have this issue repeatable. If I see this come up again I'll re-post the issue. Thanks!
